医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
最近的研究强调饮食对于预防癌症的重要性最近的研究强调了饮食在预防癌症中的作用，强调地中海饮食和植物性饮食，同时注意到与红肉相关的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Recent-studies-underscore-the-importance-of-diet-for-the-prevention-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Recent-studies-underscore-the-importance-of-diet-for-the-prevention-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e30428c1-bb49-4e74-8555-045042d79fa0 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 04:41:00 -0400 Recent studies underscore the importance of diet for the prevention of cancer
研究发现怀孕期间的颗粒物污染可能会影响新生儿的肾功能研究表明，妊娠期暴露于空气污染会增加脐带血胱抑素 C 水平，表明新生儿存在潜在的肾功能问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Research-finds-pativity-pollution-during-pregnancy-may-impact-newborn-kidney-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Research-finds-pativity-pollution-during-pregnancy-may-impact-newborn-kidney-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a54c2e8-30b2-42e6-878c-2808c3708e08 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 04:03:00 -0400 Research finds particulate pollution during pregnancy may impact newborn kidney function
临床试验中，替泽帕肽在控制糖尿病和促进减肥方面优于胰岛素Tirzepatide 是一种每周一次的双重激动剂，在降低 2 型糖尿病患者的 HbA1c、体重和改善心血管标志物方面优于长效胰岛素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Tirzepatide-outperforms-insulin-in-controlling-diabetes-and-promoting-weight-loss-in-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Tirzepatide-outperforms-insulin-in-controlling-diabetes-and-promoting-weight-loss-in-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0acd7e88-5a28-4ded-afac-225a31674097 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 01:23:00 -0400 Tirzepatide outperforms insulin in controlling diabetes and promoting weight loss in clinical trials
母乳喂养期间使用索马鲁肽安全吗？研究人员在母乳中未发现可检测到的索马鲁肽水平，这表明母乳喂养的婴儿面临的风险很小，但强调了监测母亲营养和产奶量的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Is-semaglutide-use-during-breastfeeding-safe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Is-semaglutide-use-during-breastfeeding-safe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7f06300-b984-4b72-af30-7a76d5a375e3 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 00:50:00 -0400 Is semaglutide use during breastfeeding safe?
NCCS 研究利用外泌体克服表皮生长因子受体抑制剂的耐药性在一项新研究中，新加坡国家癌症中心 (NCCS) 的临床医生科学家和研究人员证明，使用外泌体可以成功靶向通常对表皮生长因子受体酪氨酸激酶抑制剂 (EGFR-TKI) 耐药的鳞状细胞癌肿瘤。他们的研究是新加坡首次将外泌体应用于靶向 TKI 耐药癌症。研究结果发表在上个月的《发育细胞》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/NCCS-study-uses-exosomes-to-overcome-resistance-to-epidermal-growth-factor-receptor-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/NCCS-study-uses-exosomes-to-overcome-resistance-to-epidermal-growth-factor-receptor-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f6c16eb-596a-4743-8709-e47dde8bd73b Mon, 02 Sep 2024 00:24:22 -0400 NCCS study uses exosomes to overcome resistance to epidermal growth factor receptor inhibitors
发酵越橘汁可减少 IBD 患者的炎症并支持肠道健康发酵越橘汁可以通过调节口腔和肠道微生物群、减少炎症和促进有益细菌生长来帮助控制炎症性肠病 (IBD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Fermented-lingonberry-juice-shown-to-reduce-inflammation-and-support-gut-health-in-IBD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Fermented-lingonberry-juice-shown-to-reduce-inflammation-and-support-gut-health-in-IBD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d467e575-3e42-4ffd-92f6-3e13595e1503 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 00:22:00 -0400 Fermented lingonberry juice shown to reduce inflammation and support gut health in IBD
HPC 中的自噬调节外泌体 miRNA 抑制肝纤维化该研究调查了自噬在肝祖细胞（HPC）中的作用及其调节外泌体 microRNA（miRNA）以抑制血吸虫病中肝纤维化的潜力，血吸虫病是一种由寄生扁虫引起的疾病，可导致严重的器官损伤，特别是对血吸虫病的治疗。肝脏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Autophagy-in-HPCs-modulates-exosomal-miRNAs-to-inhibit-liver-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Autophagy-in-HPCs-modulates-exosomal-miRNAs-to-inhibit-liver-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a875492-3405-498d-bad7-bae2eee70d91 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 00:15:41 -0400 Autophagy in HPCs modulates exosomal miRNAs to inhibit liver fibrosis
研究发现可穿戴监测仪可有效诊断心房颤动杜克临床研究所领导的一项研究显示，与常规护理相比，可穿戴式长期连续心脏监护仪帮助发现的心房颤动病例增加了 52%，但这并没有减少因中风住院的人数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Study-finds-wearable-monitors- effective-in-diagnosing-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Study-finds-wearable-monitors- effective-in-diagnosing-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08d2330d-1122-4479-b012-c75a3f925b89 Sun, 01 Sep 2024 23:58:19 -0400 Study finds wearable monitors effective in diagnosing atrial fibrillation
科学家绘制食物微生物及其肠道微生物组影响图研究人员推出了精心策划的食品宏基因组数据 (cFMD) 资源，揭示了食品中广泛的微生物多样性及其对人类微生物组的影响，其中在婴儿中发现了显着的重叠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Scientists-map-food-microbes-and-their-gut-microbiome-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Scientists-map-food-microbes-and-their-gut-microbiome-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34dc631e-2c10-4f61-8b5b-d27ee5769235 Sun, 01 Sep 2024 23:54:00 -0400 Scientists map food microbes and their gut microbiome impact
研究发现接触寒冷几天后心脏病发作的风险更高美国心脏病学会旗舰期刊 JACC 今天发表并在 2024 年欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 大会上发表的一项研究显示，暴露在较低气温和寒冷时期后，因心脏病入院的人数会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Study-finds-higher-heart-attack-risk-days-after-cold-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240901/Study-finds-higher-heart-attack-risk-days-after-cold-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e95f648-87e8-49ea-9728-b59cafffae9c Sun, 01 Sep 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Study finds higher heart attack risk days after cold exposure
